She nods. "Fairies need diapers until they are initiated. That's when you get your wings and magical abilities."

"Why did you do this to me?" you ask as you begin to feel wetness spreading against your bottom and between your legs. A moment later you realise that you're wetting yourself.

"Because I love you." she says. "Fairies can't have the same sort of long-term relationships that humans do."
121112111.title: Sit down next to her

1211121111.content:
"Um.." you say, turning a little red. "I think I just had an accident."

"You wet your diaper?" she asks.

You just nod.

"Okay." she says, getting out of bed. "Let's get you changed." She takes you by the hand and leads you back to the room you woke up in.

"Up on the changing table." she directs you.
1211121111.title: Tell her that your diaper is wet

choices: Ask how long you need to be in diapers
12111211111.content:
You climb onto the changing table and lay down. Sandra pushes your nightie up out of the way and then pulls down your plastic pants. Next, she unclips the pins holding your nappy on and pulls it open. The air feels cold on your damp privates but the baby-wipe she begins cleaning you with feels colder.

Sandra drops the soggy diaper into a diaper pail and reaches under the changing table to retrieve a clean one. She folds it and then slides it under your bottom. Then she sprinkles baby powder on you before pulling the front and sides of the diaper up and pinning them firmly in place. After pulling a clean pair of pink plastic pants up your legs she declares. "All done." She helps you down from the table.
12111211111.title: Get onto the changing table

121112111111.content:
"Thank you Sandra." you say, genuinely grateful to be dry again.

She smiles and kisses you on the forehead. "You're welcome Michelle but you should start calling me Mommy. You're my little girl now."
121112111111.title: Thank her for changing you

1211121111111.content:
"Okay Mommy." you say.

"You're such a good little girl." She gives you a big smile then hugs you. "Now let's find my little girl something cute to wear today." she goes to the wardrobe and pulls out a blue and white dress with a pleated skirt. "I think you'll look adorable in this."
1211121111111.title: Say "Okay Mommy."

12111211111111.content:
She lays the dress on your bed and then takes hold of the hem of your nightie and says "Arms up." as she pulls it up over your head. She then replace it with the dress which, thankfully, does a much better job on concealing your diaper.

"Yep." Sandra says, stepping back to examine you. "Adorable"

You smile at the compliment.

"I'm going to wash up and then make us some breakfast." she says. "You can play in your room or watch cartoons in the living room." she suggests as she leaves.
12111211111111.title: Wear the dress

choices: Say that you don't want to go outside
Ask what she has in mind
121112111111111.content:
You look around at the dolls and teddy-bears on your shelves. Sandra has really given you a lot of them. You guess that she expects you to play like a little girl too. You take down a few of the dolls and begin to make up a story, which you act out with them.

You become quite involved in your game and discover that you are quite reluctant to leave it when Sandra calls you to have breakfast.

After you've both finished eating, Sandra asks "What do you want to do today? It's your first day as my little girl. We should go out and do something special."
121112111111111.title: Play in your new room

12111211111112.content:
"Um... Mommy." you say. "Could I please wear something less... um... girly."

"Okay." she agrees. "I won't rush you into this." she replaces the dress and looks through the wardrobe. "How about these?" She holds up a pair of bib-front overalls with a pink heart embroidered on the chest. "Or, if we're going to stay home today you could just wear a t-shirt with your diapers.
12111211111112.title: Ask for something less girly

choices: Let her put the dress on you
121112111112.content:
"How long do I need to be in diapers for?" you ask.

"That depends on how soon you are ready for initiation." she says. "I know some fairies who were initiated after a couple of years but there are others who have been in diapers for over a hundred years and still aren't ready."

"A hundred years?" you ask. "How long do fairies live?"

"Forever, potentially." she says. "We stop aging at around what humans would consider 25 years old. That's the main reason we can't have a long-term relationship with a man the same way human women can."

"Because the man would grow old and die while you stay young forever?" you ask.

"Yes." she says. "But that's not going to happen to you now is it?" She smiles then opens the wardrobe. "Now let's find my little girl something cute to wear today." she pulls out a blue and white dress with a pleated skirt.
121112111112.title: Ask how long you need to be in diapers

choices: Ask her why you need to let her do it
Tell her that you are not a baby
12111211112.content:
"I can handle this myself." you insist.

"Michelle." Sandra says. "I'm your mommy now. You need to let me take care of you."
12111211112.title: Insist on doing it yourself

choices: Say that you don't think you can trust her after doing this to you
121112111121.content:
"Why?" you ask. "Why do I need to let you treat me like a toddler?"

"It's the first step toward your initiation." she explains. "Before we can do anything else we need to develop a bond as mother and daughter."

"I don't understand." you say. "What do I need to do for this initiation."

"You don't need to worry about that yet." she says. "All you need to know is that before we start you need to trust me as completely as a child trusts her mommy."

choices: Complain about the bottles and diapers
Accept it and go to the park
121112111121121.content:
You sigh, but let her dress you.

You look into the mirror and smile. You look very cute, even when it is still hard to accept that the fairy girl in the mirror is really you.

"Okay, so I am your daughter." You grin.
"May I have ice-cream and can we go to the park and slide down all the big slides?"

She giggles and nods her head.
"Sure baby, mommy is happy to make you happy."

She take a bag and stuff some diapers in it. You blush when you think about being changed in the park. Next she take baby bottles and you gulp.
121112111121121.title: Let her put the dress on you

choices: Wait for Sandra to finish with the shower
121112111122.content:
"I'm not a baby." you say. "And you're not my mother."

Sandra looks hurt and leaves the room without another word.

You feel bad for a moment then remind yourself that she is the one who turned you into an incontinent little girl.

As you look around the room, trying to figure out how to clean yourself up you hear running water from the bathroom, That must be Sandra having a shower. Why didn't you think of that? You do find some baby-wipes under the changing table next to the baby powder and stacks of diapers.
121112111122.title: Tell her that you are not a baby

121112112.content:
"Just get on with it." you say, crossing your arms. Then you realise that you must look like a child throwing a tantrum and uncross them. "How did you turn me into a girl and why am I wearing a diaper?"

"You're not a girl." she says. "You just look like one."

"Yes." you say. "I know that."

"No." she explains. "You're really a newborn fairy."

"What are you talking about?" you ask.

"I'm a fairy." she says simply. "Fairies are all female. We have children by mating with human males."

You don't know what to say. You're currently trying to figure out which one of you has lost their mind. Maybe both.

"Except we don't get pregnant." she continues. "The male transforms into our baby."

"You think I'm a baby?" you ask. "Is that why you've put me in a diaper?"

"Baby fairies might look like 10-year-old human girls." she says. "But they are completely incontinent. You'll be in diapers until you are initiated."

"Initiated?" you ask.

"When you get your wings and magical abilities." she explains.

"You knew this would happen and you still had sex with me." you say. "Why would you do that to me?"

"I love you." she says. "But fairies can't have a relationship in the same way humans do."

"Why not?" you ask. "Because you can't have sex? We were together for a year without sex."

"There is the sex." she says. "But also fairies stop aging at what humans would consider their mid-20s. If we were together you would grow old and eventually die while I stay like this forever."

"So instead of being my girlfriend you chose to be by mother?" you ask.

"Yes." she says. "I want to take care of you."

"You might have included me in the decision." you point out.

"Would you have agreed?" she asks.
121112112.title: Tell her to get on with it

choices: Tell her that she can come in.
Tell her that you need some time to find out if you can forgive her.
1211121121.content:
"Yes, I would have agreed, I mean I would do almost everything to make you happy, even becoming your baby fairy daughter, but that is not the point, the point is that you didn't trusted me enough to let me make my own decision. I still can't believe that you turned my whole life upside down, without even asking me, didn't you even thought that I might want to meet my family one last time before the transformation to give them and myself closure." you reply, before you furiously head in your into your new room and close the door before Sandra can react.

After a few minutes you hear Sandra knocking at the door,saying. "I am sorry Michael, please let me explain why I was too afraid to tell you the truth."

What will you do?
1211121121.title: Say yes

choices: In anger, she's trying to bribe you now?
Guilt, she's trying to make up for her actions
12111211212.content:
"So now you ask for me to make my choice? Whether to forgive a girl who basically just used me to become a mother, or to be spiteful about it! Was this your plan all along? Use me? God! It must have been! Just let me alone!" You scream, realizing that Sandra did use you! Had she, since the first day, just been using you for her own gain?

"Michael it's not like that! I...I know it was wrong not to tell you! I'm sorry!" Sandra said, sounding barely sorry at all.

"So you knew it was wrong, yet refused to tell me? Sandra, do you realize that you just chose to make me never meet any of my former friends, family, or any one? I can never meet them again! They'll just think I'm some crazy girl!" You scream back, with your squeaky young girls voice, realizing once again that Sandra really didn't care.

"I know! It sounds selfish! And I'm sorry! But I made the best choice for both of us!" Sandra said once again, sounding minorly like she as crying.

"'Best choice for both of us'" You mocked her, then returned back to your anger. "You know Sandra, a couple nights ago, you were stone cold wasted. And I could've made 'the best choice for both of us'
and had my way with you! But I respected your inability to choose, and this is what I get in return?"

"I remember! I know it was bad! I-Im sorry! I can't say it enough! I'm sorry! I can't reverse my choices..but I can make up for them.." Sandra replied, and soon you heard her walking away from the door, before you could reply.

"I hope you're happy Sandra! Now I'm your little girl!" You scream out, before Sandra the area you could talk to.

The anger not leaving your body, and still feeling like Sandra had betrayed you, time passed quickly. Soon, it felt like an hour had passed, and then you heard Sandras voice once more. It sounded like she had cried, but what was she crying over? Changing you, or just you being angry? You already knew that answer.

"I.....I made your favorite snack Michael..nac..nachos and coca-cola.. I know it's not much..b-but I know you like them.." You heard her whisper, before opening the door and attempt to give to you. Sandra looked...bad. She had obviously cried a lot, and her eyes were puffed up red. Besides for that, her hair looked tangled and messed up.

How do you react?
12111211212.title: Tell her that you need some time to find out if...

121112112121.content:
"So that's your plan now! Bribe me! Since you know I realize you were using me, you now want to bribe me! Do you think that it makes it any less worse? To go from guys in his 20s to a girl who's like 10, and your first thought is 'hey, I'll bribe him so he won't complain about it!'" You scream at her, your anger coming back full swing.

"I..it's not that! I..I just thought it would help make up for it! Or just relax you a bit.." Sandra replied, slightly whispering the last part.

"So that's how little I mean to you? A plate of nachos and some coco-cola is what I equal? Wow Sandra! Thanks for subtly telling me that I'm comparable to a plate of food!" You yell again harshly. Maybe you were being a bit to hard on her. But she wasn't the 10 year old baby girl.

"N..no! I didn't mean it like that at all! It was a peace offering, not a humiliation tactic! I know you're angry right now! Just please hear me out! I know I took advantage of you! I know I violated every right of yours! I know if it was reversed, I would be angry! But I can't change the past! If I would, I would reverse the spell in a heart beat! Just forgive me!" Sandra pleaded, her eyes welling up with tears.

"Forgive you? Forgive you! Sandra, who am I talking to? The Sandra that seduces her boyfriend, and then tricks him to become a her. The Sandra that willingly makes her boyfriend ignorant of her true ability! Or am I talking to the Sandra that says she's sorry after doing all of the above? Tell the truth now!" You glare at her once more, waiting for her response.

"I...I don't know.. I did make you willingly ignorant! I did wrongfully seduce you! But I did those things stupidly! I should've asked! B..b..but I imagined you as my daughter..and couldn't beat the temptation! It's wrong I know!" Sandra said, placing the drink and food down on the rooms dresser.

"Well I hope you're fully happy now Sandra! I hope your temptation is gone! So what now? I can't go and get a job! I can't viist friends! I can't do anything besides stay in this house, or go places with you! I hope you're hapoy! We're closer then we have ever been before! I'm your daughter, you tricked me, and now get your reward! Happy as ever?" You replied with cold malice.

Sandra looked like she would reply, but ran out of the room crying and slammed the door shut. Good! Your former girlfriend had realized how bad she was! But the you realized something. You really needed the bathroom. Like..right now. Should you try and find one youself, or just tough it out?
121112112121.title: In anger, she's trying to bribe you now?

choices: Take off the diaper and clean yourself up
12111212.content:
"Okay." you agree, too confused to argue.

Sandra puts on a dressing gown and leads you out to the living room. "Watch some cartoons while I cook breakfast." she turns on the TV.

You shrug and sit on the sofa. Sailor Moon is on. You remember watching this as a child and become engrossed in the show as Sandra goes into the kitchen.

Your attention is broken a few minutes later by a warm wet feeling against your bottom and between your legs. It takes you a moment to realise what's happening. You're wetting yourself. You didn't even feel like you needed to pee.

You jump up from the sofa, afraid that you might ruin it. Then remember that you're wearing a diaper ans plastic pants. They protect the furniture but hold the dampness against your skin.
12111212.title: Have breakfast

121112121.content:
You head to the bathroom and pull down the plastic pants. Then you unclip the pins holding your diaper on and let it fall heavily to the floor.

You can see some baby-wipes on the counter. You could use them to clean yourself quickly or you could have a shower.
121112121.title: Take off the diaper and clean yourself up

choices: Call Sandra and tell her that you are wet
121112122.content: You don't know what you would do after taking this diaper off. Put another one on? It seems like you need to wear one.
121112122.title: Keep the diaper on

1211122.content:
You head away from Sandra's room into the living room. It's exactly as it was left last night.

You can see the front door. If Sandra did this to you then maybe you don't want to be here when she wakes up but that means going out in public in a nightie and diaper.
1211122.title: Go to the living room

choices: Take off the wet diaper and have a shower
12111221.content:
You feel trapped. You can't go outside like this. Where would you even go? It all feels too much. You sit on the sofa and begin to cry like the little girl you now resemble.

You don't know how long you sit sobbing quietly but your self-pity is interrupted by a feeling of wetness spreading against your bottom. After a moment you realise that you're wetting yourself. You didn't even feel like you needed to pee.

The diaper and plastic pants protect the sofa from your accident but keep the wet feeling pressed against your skin. You wonder if you should clean yourself up.
12111221.title: Wait here

121112211.content:
You can't just sit here in a soggy diaper. That would make you feel more childish than you already do.

You waddle uncomfortably to the bathroom and remove the nightie and plastic pants. Then up unclip the pins holding your diaper on and let it fall heavily to the floor between your feet.

Now naked, you can see that you are definitely no longer a man. You turn on the shower and get in.

The sound of the running water must have woken Sandra because she comes in a few minutes later. "Good morning." She seems completely unsurprised by your new body and by the soggy nappy laying on the floor.
121112211.title: Take off the wet diaper and have a shower

choices: Tell her that your diaper is wet
121112212.content:
You sit there in your soggy diaper with your head in your hands until Sandra finally emerges from her bedroom. "Good morning." she says cheerfully. "Did you sleep well?

She seems completely unsurprised by your appearance. Either she is responsible for it or you're going crazy.

You opt to believe the first option. "Did you do this to me?" you ask.

"Why don't you let me make breakfast." she suggests. "Then I'll explain while we eat."
121112212.title: Stay where you are

12111222.content:
As embarrassing as it might be, you want out of this place.

You find your car keys and wallet near the sofa and head out of the house. Then, taking a deep breath, you open the front door and step out. You get a couple of odd looks on the way to your car. You begin to worry that these people might call the police if they see a young girl get into a car and drive away.
12111222.title: Leave

121112221.content: You ignore the stares and climb into the driver's seat. You start the engine and pull out onto the road.
121112221.title: Drive

choices: Tell her to leave you alone
Tell her that you are on your way home from a sleep over
121112222.content:
As much as you hate begin in public like this, having to explain it to a police officer would be worse. You walk down the street, feeling more and more eyes follow you, and sit at the bus stop.

A woman approaches you. "Are you alright honey?" she asks. "Where are your parents?"
121112222.title: Take a bus

1211122222.content:
"I am fine I am just on my way home from a sleepover. And I am already ten years old. I only need diapers because I am incontinent. Thank you for asking Madam." That seems to convince her and she leaves you alone.

Soon the bus arrives and you get in.

Soon you have to decide if you head home or if you head to the nearest mall to buy fitting clothes.
1211122222.title: Tell her that you are on your way home from a s...

12112.content:
"Sandra?" you call out are shocked when you hear yourself. You sound like a little girl. "Sandra?" you call again, as much to double check what you heard as to get her attention.

Moments later you hear someone moving around, then footsteps approaching. Finally Sandra open's the door. "Good morning Michelle." she says. "I didn't expect you to wake up so early."

"Who is Michelle?" you ask. "Why am I dressed like this and why am I wearing a diaper?"

"Okay sweetie." she says. "Calm down and I'll explain."

"What's going on?" you ask.

"I'm a fairy." she says. "Fairies are all female. We have children by having sex with a human male. We don't get pregnant though. The man is transformed into a newborn fairy."

"So you think I'm a baby fairy?" you say. "And that's why you've diapered me in my sleep and dressed me in this nightie?"

She picks up a hand mirror from the desk and holds it up so that you can see your reflection. "Newborn fairies look like 10-year-old human girls." she explains.

You examine your reflection and move from one side to the other to confirm that the little girl in the mirror with the confused expression is really you.

"You knew that this would happen if we had sex?" you ask.

She nods.

"Why?" you demand.

"A fairy feels the same urges to be a mother as a human female." she explains. "This is just how we do it."

"You might have included me in this decision." you say.

"Would you have agreed?" she asks.
12112.title: Call for Sandra

choices: Demand that she explains everything now.
121122.content:
"How I am supposed to answer this question, I mean you didn't even tell me yet, what being your baby fairy daughter involves all together. But I am sure that I had at least given it a serious thought." you point out.

"Oh, I totally forgot about that sweetie, you are right. Tell you what sweetie I will make breakfast and than I will tell everything that there is to know about being my fairy daughter."
121122.title: Say that you can't answer the question without mor

choices: .. that the magic can't be undone by then.
.. you should not worry about anything.
1211221.content:
She takes her time arranging breakfast and you shift on your chair from side to side. the thick diaper feels strange und you cannot belief you really need her - you look like a 10 years old and not like a baby.

Sandra look at the clock from times to times and her smile is happier each time.

You look at her.
"What is going on? Is something happening at 7?"

She smiles and tell you
1211221.title: Let her make breakfast first.

choices: You decide to let the chance to change back pass away.
You insist that Sandra tries to change you back regardless.
You let Sandra explain the possible side effects first
12112211.content: "Well to be honest with you until 7am your transformation can technically be undone. But that would require using the most difficult spell a fairy can use. At best it has a success rate of around 50% and with every second that passes it decrease further. And even if works without any dangerous side effects it would leave you immune to any further transformation attempts. And by old fairy laws I would have to erase any memory you have off me and leave you alone for good. But why would you want to go broke when you can play it safe and spend eternity at my side."
12112211.title: .. that the magic can't be undone by then.

1212.content:
"It won't take long." you say, opening the door.

You find Sandra's spare room decorated for a young girl. It is set up with matching furniture in pink and white. A bed with a bright floral bedspread, shelves full of dolls and teddy-bears and a small desk with a mirror. On the desk sits the source of the strange light, a small nightlight.

Out of place, but strangely matching the rest of the furniture is what appears to be a baby's changing table, except much larger.

"Whose room is this?" you ask, turning on the ceiling light and looking around.

"I...um" she tries to think of a lie but then admits. "It was going to be yours."

"I don't think I understand." you say.

"I'm a fairy." she says the only thing that could make less sense than her last statement.

"Now I'm sure I don't understand." you say.

"When a fairy wants a baby they have sex with a human male." she explains. "But they don't get pregnant like a human female, instead the man becomes a baby fairy."

"This isn't a baby's room." you say. "Well except for the changing table."

"A baby fairy looks like a normal little girl, about 10 years old." she continues. "They still have their personality and all of the memories of their old life but they are incontinent."

"So you were going to have sex with me in order to turn me into a 10-year-old girl who needs diapers?" you sum up her explanation.

"Yes." she says. "But I guess that's not going to happen now."

"If you didn't want to have sex you could have just told me." you say. "You didn't have to make up this ridiculous story."

"I'm telling the truth." she insists. "I really am a fairy."
1212.title: Investigate the light

choices: Say that you can't let her do that to you
12121.content:
"Really?" you say, getting tired of this nonsense. "Then prove it."

"Okay." she says, unzipping her dress and letting it fall to the floor. As she stands there in her underwear translucent silvery butterfly-like wings suddenly grow out of her back. They begin to flutter and she lifts off the ground. "Now do you believe me?"

With your mouth hanging open, you just nod.

She gracefully returns to the ground "Maybe we should sit down and talk." she suggests, leading you back to the sofa.

When you are seated you ask. "What else can fairies do?"

"I can change my size." She suddenly shrinks to 2 inches tall and flies over to hover near you. "I also have some other magical abilities." She returns to her seat and her normal size.

"And you want to turn me into a fairy too?" you ask.

"Yes." she says. "I like you and I want you to be in my life but a fairy can't have long-term relationship in the same way humans do."

"Why?" you ask. "Because you can only have sex once?"

"That is one of the problems." she says. "The other is that we stop aging at what humans would consider about 25. I'll be like this forever but you'd grow old and die."

"But I wouldn't be a man anymore." you point out. "Would you still want a relationship with me?"

"A different sort of relationship." she says. "You see, like human women, fairies feel the urge to have children. I've been going out with you to determine if you're someone I want as a daughter."

"And I am?" you ask.

"Yes." she smiles, "I love you."
12121.title: Tell her to prove it

121211.content:
"I love you too Sandra and I want to spend eternity with you and if that means becoming your baby fairy dauther then I am fine with that. But I think we both need to go to bed now." you tell her.

She nods. "Thank you so much Michael. You can sleep over if you want."
121211.title: Agree to become her daughter

12122.content:
"I've had enough of this." you say, turning to leave. "Goodbye Sandra."

"Wait." she calls to you. "Michael."

"I'm sorry." she says. "I'm just nervous. Please stay."
12122.title: Walk out

121221.content:
You are not sure if you should believe Sandra's explanation because if it is true, that would mean that Sandra must has really serve trust issues, and that would be something you probably would have noticed during the last year, but it would also explain why Sandra decided to go out with you in the first place. You are the typical nice guy kind of man, which all women want to befriend with, because you always do the right thing but in the end they always date the good-looking assholes that break their hearts. If Sandra really has trust issues you can't leave her like that, you have to help her to overcome these and if that means having sex with her, then doing the right thing would finally pay off.

"Don't worry Sandra, I stay. I am sorry for my outburst earlier, I just was afraid of being friend zoned for the third time." you say.

"Thank you Michael for staying and don't worry I would never do that, let’s go into my bedroom so I can show you that I am serious."

Of course you let her lead you into her bedroom, since finally having sex with Sandra, is something you have waited for a whole year.


Around the bed, she lights candles and begins to undress herself seductively. Much less gracefully, you remove your own clothes. She lays on the bed and you join her, exploring her naked body with your hands. She arches her back and moans. Finally you slide your penis into her and begin to thrust.

You both orgasm together and collapse on the bed panting. You begin to feel very drowsy and soon drift off to sleep next to her.

You feel much smaller and you also feel wet and messy between your legs, as you look down you see that you wear a pink nightie and under neat that, a pair of pink plastic pants and, under those, a thick terry nappy, which smells like you wet and messed yourself while being asleep. Now sitting upright you can see your reflection in a mirror that stands in a corner of the room, you almost freak out as you realize that you now look like a ten year old girl. Then you suddenly realize that Sandra must have told the truth about her being a fairy and that having sex with her would turn you into a baby fairy that appears to be a ten year old incontinent girl.

On one hand you are of course very angry at Sandra because she took advantage of you to turn you into her baby fairy daughter but on the other hand you know that you have to stay with her now, because nobody would believe you and Sandra is the only person you know that can introduce you to your new life.

After some time your thoughts are dawn back to the wet and messy diaper that you are wearing. At first you want to call out for Sandra to change your diaper, since she was the one that turned you into a incontinent baby fairy so she should change your messy diapers, but then you think that you might be too upset at moment to deal with Sandra, so that facing her now could cause you to say things that you might regret later, so maybe changing your own diaper on the changing table; where you see all the needed diapering supplies to do so would be the better idea.

In the end you decided to…
121221.title: Stay

choices: no she knows that you will come back
121222.title: Leave

choices: Put her to bed and go home
122.content:
You lay Sandra on her bed and climb in too. You kiss her passionately and begin sliding your hand up her leg, under her skirt, to her privates.

"No." she says, pushing your hand away. "Don't."

"Why not?" you ask, removing your hand from her leg.

"Because then we'll have sex." she says, slurring her speech slightly.

"What's so bad about that?" you ask.

"We aren't ready." She repeats her usual excuse.

"Ready for what?" you ask.

"For me to take care of you." she says.

"What do you mean?" you ask. "Why would you need to take care of me?"

"Because I'm a fairy." she says.
122.title: Start making out

choices: Call Sandra to check on her
1221.content:
"Okay." you say, tucking her in. "You're a little bit drunk." You turn off the lights and leave. "Talk to you tomorrow."

The next morning you wake up and wonder how Sandra is feeling. She had to be pretty drunk to think that she was a fairy.
1221.title: Put her to bed and go home

12211.content:
You dial Sandra's number. It rings for a long time before she groggily answers "Michael? What time is it."

"It's only 8:30" you inform her. "I just wanted to check that you were okay."

"Why?" she asks. "Why wouldn't I be okay."

"Well you were pretty drunk last night." you tell her. "You were telling me that you were a..."

"Oh shit." she interrupts you. "I told you that I'm a fairy."

"Yeah." you say. "You really can't handle alcohol."

"Um." she says. "Maybe we should talk."

"What's the matter?" you ask.

"I shouldn't have told you that I'm a fairy." she says. "I need to explain things."

"Huh?" you say. "Isn't it a bit early to start drinking again?"

"I'm serious." she says. "Please come over."

"Okay." you agree, a little concerned that Sandra might be losing her mind.
12211.title: Call Sandra to check on her

choices: Call your friends and see what they are doing
12212.content: You decide that the best thing for Sandra right now is sleep. You get out of bed and start your day. It's Saturday and you don't have any plans yet.
12212.title: Let her sleep it off

choices: Tuck her in and go home
Ask her to show you her wings
1222.content:
"You're a fairy?" you ask.

She nods.

"And because you're a fairy, if we have sex you have to take care of me?" you continue.

She nods again.

"Why?" you ask.

"Because you'll be my baby." she says.

"If we have sex I'll be your baby?" you repeat.

She nods. "That's how we make baby fairies." She explains with slurred speech. "If a man has sex with a fairy he turns into a baby fairy."

"And when will we be ready for me to be your baby fairy?" you do your best not to laugh.

"When I know you love me enough to accept it." she says. "I don't want you to be angry with me."

"For turning me into a baby?" you ask.

"You won't be a little baby." she tries to explain "You'll look like a 10-year-old girl. But you will need to wear diapers."

"Diapers?" you can't help laughing a little. "Why?"

"Because baby fairies need diapers until they are initiated." she explains.

"Initiated?" you ask.

"That's when they get their wings." she says. "And magic."
1222.title: Question her further

choices: Call Sandra to check on her
12221.content:
"Okay." you say, tucking her in. "You're a little bit drunk." You turn off the lights and leave. "Talk to you tomorrow."

The next morning you wake up and wonder how Sandra is feeling. She had to be pretty drunk to think that she was a fairy. And what was that nonsense about turning into a little girl who needs diapers if you have sex with her? You don't remember anything about this in stories about fairies you've heard.
12221.title: Tuck her in and go home

12222.content:
"So you have wings?" you ask.

She nods.

"Can I see them?" you request.

She takes off her top and concentrates for a moment. Then suddenly, translucent silvery butterfly-like wings grow out of her back.

You stare at her with your mouth open then manage to say "You really are a fairy?"

"That's what I said." she rolls her eyes.

"Can you fly?" you ask, trying to get your head around this.

"Yep" her wings flutter and she lifts off her bed. in her tipsy state however, she is a bit unsteady and drifts sideways into the wall with a thud. "ow!" she complains rubbing her shoulder.

"I think we both need to go to bed." you tell her.

She nods. "You can sleep over if you want."
12222.title: Ask her to show you her wings

info.brief_description: A fairy transforms you into her diaper-dependent daughter.
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please join our Google Group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/thicklypadded

You start the story as Michael, A man in his 20s.

You have been dating Sandra for almost a year but you still haven't had sex. You don't know it yet but Sandra is a fairy and sex with her will be life-changing.

The image mankind has of fairies is almost completely wrong. This is mostly due to deliberate misinformation on the part of the fairies themselves. Most of the time, they live among us as apparently normal people.

Fairies are all female and look especially beautiful and do not age beyond what humans would consider their mid-20s. They do have wings, but generally keep them magically hidden. They have other magical abilities too, including shrinking themselves to the size of more traditionally recognised fairies.

In order to reproduce, fairies must have sex with human males. The act magically transforms the men into young fairies, resembling human girls of about 10 years old. They are much more dependent on their new mothers than real human children of that age because technically, despite retaining their personality and memories of their old lives, they are babies.

This includes being completely incontinent. Young fairies need to wear diapers until they are initiated as fully-fledged fairies, at which point they gain their wings and magical abilities.
